typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> music
music derive(Datestamp = currentDate()) ~> datestamp
datestamp split(startsWith(Column_3,'C'),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(startwithT)
ConditionalSplit1@startwithT sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['myfile.csv'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> MuscC
